channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游리 20:50 pm alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirovskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 20:50 pm alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider, anxiety is still in:- Marganets and Marganetsky territorial community-mirovskaya territorial community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
